entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain over eastern sections. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
